item.title: Word Identification
item.instruction: Identify the words while ignoring the background noise
item.example: ನಾಯಿ - ಬೆಕ್ಕು ಸರಿ ಉತ್ತರ: ಎರಡೂ ಪ್ರಾಣಿಗಳು

item.title: Syllables
item.instruction: Click on the green button and repeat the syllable everytime it's presented

item.title: Words
item.instruction: Click on the green button and repeat the words everytime it's presented

item.title: Sentences
item.instruction: Click on the green button and repeat the sentences everytime it's presented

item.title: Syllables
item.instruction: Click on the green button only when target syllable is presented

item.title: Words
item.instruction: Click on the green button only when target word is presented

item.title: Sentences
item.instruction: Click on the green button only when target sentence is presented

item.title: Recalling syllables
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the syllables that will be presented

item.title: Recalling Words
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the words that will be presented

item.title: Recalling Sentences
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the sentences that will be presented

item.title: Recalling syllables
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the syllables that will be presented
Identify and tell if the syllable is a vowel or consonant after each presentation

item.title: Recalling Words
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the words that will be presented
Identify and tell if the word represents an eatable or not after each presentation

item.title: Recalling Sentences
instruction: Listen carefully and memorize all the sentences that will be presented
Identify and tell if the sentence is a true or a false statement after each presentation

item.title: Predicting the outcome
item.instruction: A situation will be presented. Tell what you will do in that situation
item.example: ನಿನ್ನ ಬಟ್ಟೆ ಕೊಳಕಾಗಿದೆ|ಸರಿ ಉತ್ತರ: ಮಣ್ಣಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಆಟವಾಡಿದೆ

item.title: Predicting the cause
item.instruction: A situation will be described.  Identify and tell the possible cause for that situation
item.example: ನಿನಗೆ ಜ್ವರ ಬಂದಿದೆ|ಸರಿ ಉತ್ತರ: ಆಸ್ಪತ್ರೆಗೆ ಹೋಗುತೇನೆ

item.title: Compare and Contrast
item.instruction: A word pair will be presented. You have to tell atleast one similarity or difference between what concept those words represent

item.title: Category Identification
item.instruction: Three words will be presented. You have to identify the category they belong to

item.title: Category Oddity
item.instruction: Four words will be presented. You have to identify the odd word
item.example: ವೃತ್ತ, ಚೌಕ, ಆಯತ, ಕೆಂಪು|ಸರಿ ಉತ್ತರ: ಕೆಂಪು

item.title: Category Member Recall
item.instruction: A category name will be presented. You have to name 3 things in that category

item.title: Object-Person Relationship
item.instruction: Identify the profession of the person associated with the word presented

item.title: Whole-Part Relationship
item.instruction: A word will be presented, you have to tell which object's part it is

item.title: Phoneme Identification - Words without clustered consonants
Phoneme Identification - Words with clustered consonants
